Articles.Content: Nutt, how are things looking, for the release of your edited, upscaled BACE parts?
Can be the basekit_Node used separately ? or will it be ??

Looks like I made a terrible mistake! The plugin does work!

Click image for download!

NOTE: If the hatches are giving you trouble just click the EVA button repetitively.

alright thanks

A few problems with the new BACE parts under 0.17, the part descriptions appear to be mixed up, and the 6-point node isn't working.

Also, how do you deploy the BACE solar panels?

Also, how do you deploy the BACE solar panels?

Activate them in a stage.
I got the node to work just rotate it

A few problems with the new BACE parts under 0.17, the part descriptions appear to be mixed up, and the 6-point node isn't working.
I got the node to work just rotate it

Exactly. For some reason, it won't work until you press "W" or "S" etc in the VAB/SPH.

Exactly. For some reason, it won't work until you press "W" or "S" etc in the VAB/SPH.

This is a problem with all node parts. It happens with ExPI and KOSMOS too.

Exactly. For some reason, it won't work until you press "W" or "S" etc in the VAB/SPH.

I have a similar problem with the Bace mod and another 6 way node from one of the other mods as well.

I try rotating both and see what happens.
This might have been mentioned before, but when I installed the Probodobodyne pack the space telescope didn't appear.
Didn't appear in game? Do you still have the part file in your parts folder?

If you have mechjeb you can add this to the .cfg

MODULE

{

name = MuMechModuleHullCamera

cameraName = Hull

cameraForward = 0, 1, 0

cameraUp = 0, 1, 0

cameraPosition = 0, 0.37, 0

cameraFoV = 10

}

I have a question to this, first, to which .cfg?

And the second, how to activate it then? Sorry, but i'm new to KSP and a total noob in using mechjeb . I already have a satellite build with the telescope thingy on top and some solar panels, also a MechJeb module and a satellite core. It got into Orbit with a launcher (yay, I got a circular orbit with mechjeb, 149/150km ). But now I want to use it as telescope to see the other planets.

Oops, sorry fo double posting, my browser refreshed, please delete my second post.

The .cfg of the telescope, and I believe that F8/F7 activate MuMechHullCameras

Thank you for you quick answer, it works now I just had to build a new Satellite, cause it said me it was missing a part, but no matter, my new Voyager 2 is on it's way to orbit I even build it more efficient, less weight, less useless parts and a new launcher

But, I want to see things far away, the poster of the script, Spaced_out said the lower the value of FoV, the higher the zoom. So, I changed the value from 10 to 5, but I didn't see a difference. I also tried it with 1, 0.001, 20, 200, 36000000000 but nothing worked, I pointed the telescope at the Mun, but it is there in original size, no matter which value I use. Do I have to change another value or am I just too stupid to use it?
